trans-unit.source: Abstract class that represents an object that can be used to navigate a tree of objects.
trans-unit.target: 表示可用于导航的对象树的对象的抽象类。

trans-unit.source: To instantiate a MarkupObject, see <xref:System.Windows.Markup.Primitives.MarkupWriter.GetMarkupObjectFor%2A> method on the <xref:System.Windows.Markup.Primitives.MarkupWriter> class.
trans-unit.target: 若要实例化 MarkupObject，请参阅<xref:System.Windows.Markup.Primitives.MarkupWriter.GetMarkupObjectFor%2A>方法<xref:System.Windows.Markup.Primitives.MarkupWriter>类。</xref:System.Windows.Markup.Primitives.MarkupWriter> </xref:System.Windows.Markup.Primitives.MarkupWriter.GetMarkupObjectFor%2A>

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, assigns a root context for <xref:System.Windows.Markup.ValueSerializer> classes.
trans-unit.target: 当在派生类中重写，会将分配的根上下文<xref:System.Windows.Markup.ValueSerializer>类。</xref:System.Windows.Markup.ValueSerializer>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Markup.IValueSerializerContext> to assign a root context for.
When overridden in a derived class, gets the attributes associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Markup.Primitives.MarkupObject"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 当在派生类中重写，获取与此关联的特性<xref href="System.Windows.Markup.Primitives.MarkupObject"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, gets the instance of the object represented by this <xref href="System.Windows.Markup.Primitives.MarkupObject"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 当在派生类中重写，获取表示此对象的实例<xref href="System.Windows.Markup.Primitives.MarkupObject"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The type of the object may not be equal to <xref:System.Windows.Markup.Primitives.MarkupObject.ObjectType%2A> if the instance represents a factory which creates instances of type <xref:System.Windows.Markup.Primitives.MarkupObject.ObjectType%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 对象的类型可能不能等于<xref:System.Windows.Markup.Primitives.MarkupObject.ObjectType%2A>实例是否表示这将创建类型<xref:System.Windows.Markup.Primitives.MarkupObject.ObjectType%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Markup.Primitives.MarkupObject.ObjectType%2A>的实例的工厂</xref:System.Windows.Markup.Primitives.MarkupObject.ObjectType%2A>

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, gets the type of the <xref href="System.Windows.Markup.Primitives.MarkupObject"></xref> instance.
trans-unit.target: 当在派生类中重写，获取的类型<xref href="System.Windows.Markup.Primitives.MarkupObject"></xref>实例。

trans-unit.source: ObjectType returns the type of the <xref:System.Windows.Markup.Primitives.MarkupObject>.
For example, an item representing a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button> would return the equivalent of **typeof(System.Windows.Button)**.
trans-unit.target: 例如，项表示<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button>将返回的等效项**typeof(System.Windows.Button)**。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button>

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, gets the properties of this <xref href="System.Windows.Markup.Primitives.MarkupObject"></xref> instance that should be written to [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: 当在派生类中重写，获取此属性<xref href="System.Windows.Markup.Primitives.MarkupObject"></xref>应写入到的实例[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]。
